name: IH Sliders & Showcases
author: Rohit Tripathi

sections.description:
This Plugin is Designed to work IH Business Pro WordPress theme:

If you are interested you can download the IH Business Pro theme from here – IH Business Pro

Once the Plugin and Theme both are activated together, you will see Following New Sections in the theme.

  1. Sliders
  2. Showcases
  3. Parallax Hero
  4. Counters
  5. Featured Areas
  6. Team
  7. Testimonials
sections.installation:
This Plugin is Generally Recommended by themes which Support it. If you theme doesn’t support this plugin, you will get a notice as soon as your activate this plugin.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Once its Activated, Go to Appearance > Customize to Configure the Slider.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

This Plugin is Generally Recommended by themes which Support it. If you theme doesn’t support this plugin, you will get a notice as soon as your activate this plugin.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Once its Activated, Go to Appearance > Customize to Configure the Slider.
